title: I cant update League Of Legends :((
body: it say to verify the logs i verified the logs but it dont worked i uninstalled the game and when i entered in game it sayed again: please verify the log.{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}} what can i do ???

replies.body: It sounds like your installation to the updated client didn't process properly.  You may need to [reinstall ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends)in this case, and either try updating again or stick to the legacy client for now.  I also recommend reporting your exact errors in the [client discussion](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion) boards for our client devs to review.  Thanks for the report!
